title: SPECTRO-RIEMANNIAN GRAPH NEURAL NETWORKS

methods.name: SPECTRO-RIEMANNIAN Graph Neural Networks
methods.description: A hybrid approach combining spectral graph theory with Riemannian (hyperbolic and spherical) geometry for graph neural networks

limitations: Limited to specific datasets: Cora, Citeseer, PubMed, Chameleon, Actor, Squirrel, Texas, Cornell; and specific hyperparameters.
summary: This paper introduces SPECTRO-RIEMANNIAN GRAPH NEURAL NETWORKS, a novel architecture integrating spectral analysis with Riemannian geometry for graph representation learning. It operates on product manifolds combining hyperbolic, spherical, and Euclidean spaces. The method utilizes edge curvature histograms and weighted frequencies to compute manifold signatures, enabling enhanced graph learning with geometric foundations.
